406b.text: With a little imagination, piles can be just as a creative part of the design of a room as any other widget.  Thanks to the 'onPileCreation' property, each of these changes to the basic pile only need a few lines of JSON.

xz6x.text: This shows a way to make small tokens essentially be all pile.  The tokens are created on demand through clones.  They are cards with 1 face that has a blue circle and a 1 on it.  When they make a pile, the pile handle covers up the 1, shows the current pile count, and is the same size as the original token.
